title: Body recovered 7 months after avalanche in Alaska; 2 still missing
description: David Linder, Charles Eppard, and Jeremy Leif were heliskiing together on March 4 when they were swept away by an avalanche.
content:
The body of one of the three skiers who went missing in an avalanche in Alaska seven months ago has been found, authorities said Tuesday.

title: Body of skier recovered 7 months after Alaska avalanche buried him and 2 others
description: The body of a skier who was caught in an avalanche in the Alaska backcountry seven months ago has been recovered, authorities said Tuesday.
content:
The body of a skier who was caught in an avalanche in the Alaska backcountry seven months ago has been recovered, authorities said Tuesday. Two other men remain missing.

title: First skier-triggered avalanche of the season was reported on Friday, CAIC says
description: The Colorado Avalanche Information Center (CAIC) said the slide occurred near Treasury Mountain in the Elk Mountains southeast of Marble.
content:
Fall is being edged out by wintry conditions in Colorado’s mountains, and a clear sign of that came on Friday with a report of the first human-triggered avalanche of the season.
